Necromancer looked on in satisfaction as Mobster seperated. He fired 
three ice blasts at Horn drill, then switched the setting and fired a 
fireball at Gigas.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Mobster had seperated right before the blast was fired, so it 
sailed over
> the Mob's head not making a scratch.
> 
> Horn Drill: So...we won?
> 
> Kracken: I don't think so...not yet...
>
